description: Unique identifier for each order (PK)
Timestamp when the order was placed
Unique identifier for the website session (FK)
Unique identifier for the user (FK)
Unique identifier for the primary product in the order if part of a bundle (FK)
Number of items in the order
Total price for the items in the order
Cost of goods sold for the items in the order
Unique identifier for each order item (PK)
Timestamp when the order was placed
Unique identifier for the order the item belongs to (FK)
Unique identifier for the product (FK)
Binary flag with a value of 1 if it's the primary item in the order
Price of the product
Cost of goods sold of the product
Unique identifier for each refund (PK)
Timestamp when the refund was issued
Unique identifier for the order item that was refunded (FK)
Unique identifier for the order the refunded item belonged to (FK)
Refund amount
Unique identifier for the product (PK)
Timestamp for when the product was launched
Name of the product
Unique identifier for the website session (PK)
Timestamp when the session started
Unique identifier for the user (FK)
Binary flag with a value of 1 if the user has had a previous ression
UTM source parameter (traffic origin)
UTM campaign parameter (marketing campaign name)
UTM content parameter (ad/content variant)
Device category (mobile or desktop)
URL for the UTM source
Unique identifier for each website pageview (PK)
Timestamp for the pageview
Unique identifier for the website session the pageview belongs to (FK)
URL path for the pageview
